/* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.PreMileageReqMapper.findPreMileageReq */ SELECT MR.REQ_NO , MR.USER_ID , TE.EMP_NAME AS USER_NAME , MR.CUST_ID , TC.CUST_NAME , MR.REQ_AMT , IFNULL(MR.APPROVE_IND, 'N') AS APPROVE_IND , DATE_FORMAT(MR.REQ_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REQ_DATE FROM MILEAGE_REQ MR LEFT JOIN TB_EMP TE ON TE.EMP_ID = MR.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_CUSTOMER TC ON TC.BIZ_NO = MR.CUST_ID WHERE 1=1
AND MR.REQ_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reqNo} ,'%')
AND TE.EMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName} ,'%')
AND TC.CUST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName} ,'%')
